attributes.action: genuine help for long term unemployed
attributes.additional_details: People who are not paid unemployment related benefits despite not having a job should be included in unemployment figures these people should also have access to the same support in there search for work as those who are able paid job seekers allowance /universal credit.  The job centre should also be providing   help with cv writing application forms and interview prep as well as inroduction to schemes such as work trials immediately a person becomes unemployed.
